entry.title: Block size following technological growth
entry.summary: In this email conversation between Mike Hearn and an unknown sender, the importance of scaling Bitcoin is discussed. Mike Hearn argues that Bitcoin must support large scale usage to remain competitive as a currency and to ensure its political survival. The sender questions Hearn's arguments and points out the assumptions and conjecture in his statements. They also argue that developers prioritizing security and decentralization should not be responsible for accommodating the business models of exchanges. The sender concludes by stating that there has been an increase in technical discussion on the topic of block size proposals.
